DOC.brief_summary: This is a pilot study evaluating tumor activity using Positron Emission Tomography, which is also known as a "PET scan". This study will assess the safety of using PD-0332991 in patients with mantle cell lymphoma.
DOC.brief_title: An Investigational Study Drug, Palbociclib (PD-0332991), Is Being Studied In Patients With Mantle Cell Lymphoma. Patients Must Have Received Prior Treatment(s) For Mantle Cell Lymphoma.

Adequate organ function as outlined in the protocol. Major surgery, radiation therapy, or systemic therapy within 4 weeks of study enrollment.
